text: O humankind! Keep from disobedience to your Lord in reverence for Him to deserve His protection, and fear a Day when no parent will be able to avail his child, nor a child avail his parent, in anything. So do not let the present, worldly life delude you, nor let any deluder (including especially Satan) delude you (in your conceptions) about God
